snippet.title: ►Fallout: New Vegas™ »ᵯᴑᴆᴆᴇᴆ» The Someguy Series: New Vegas Bounties II - Complete HD Walkthrough
snippet.description:
This walkthrough contains every single quest from the amazing mod "New Vegas Bounties II" and extras. I'll add a timeline one day, but that'll take some time!

This is by far, with 11.5 hours, the longest video on my channel. Sometimes the audio is a second out of sync. I apologize!

If you enjoyed watching this video, please leave a like and subscribe! I would very much appreciate it!

As one of my favourite games and favourite of the franchise, I've completed Fallout: New Vegas for over 5 times now. Despite the older graphics, I can recommend the game to anyone! 

As I completed the main multiple times, I was thinking about having even more fun in New Vegas. That's why I decided to play and record the most amazing mods released for Fallout: New Vegas. Enjoy!

Fallout 3: GOTY playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf94elJcXAfdU9-3uTIuOLoV
Fallout: New Vegas Ultimate Edition playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf-SRXb_G3ex_h_eQ9A2ntEM
Fallout 4: GOTY playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf8M9ab-en1epSzP2RHBxzZE

Summary: New Vegas Bounties II is the sequel the popular New Vegas Bounties I, and picks up immediately after the uncertain ending of the first episode. Without a firm to provide sponsorship, you must strike out as a solo contractor for the NCR. As such, you are no longer obligated to follow a linear questline, but may pursue dozens of bounties in any order. 

Your targets will include terrorists, duelists, fiends, traitors, rapists, and more! As in episode I, most of the named adversaries are boss-caliber, and make use of perks, powerful weapons, and countless cronies to thwart your efforts. 

Like its predecessor, NVB II contains a healthy dose of profanity and violence. Nonetheless, it includes substantially more dialogue options, as well as choices that should accommodate players at both ends of the karma spectrum.

Release Date: April 1, 2011
Genre: Action role-playing
Platforms: Windows
Publisher: Someguy2000
Developer: Someguy2000

My Xbox360 gamertag: Shad0wx54x

Wanna see more of my fantastic walkthroughs? Give it a go: https://www.youtube.com/user/ToughGamingGuy/playlists
